upgrade.0: When using an Elemental Skill, All Elemental DMG Bonus will be increased by 8% for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 24% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, every 1,000 HP cleared in the process will provide 2% All Elemental DMG Bonus. Up to a maximum of 12% All Elemental DMG can be gained this way. This effect lasts 15s. Bond of Life: Absorbs healing for the character based on its base value, and clears after healing equal to this value is obtained.
upgrade.1: When using an Elemental Skill, All Elemental DMG Bonus will be increased by 10% for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 24% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, every 1,000 HP cleared in the process will provide 2.5% All Elemental DMG Bonus. Up to a maximum of 15% All Elemental DMG can be gained this way. This effect lasts 15s. Bond of Life: Absorbs healing for the character based on its base value, and clears after healing equal to this value is obtained.
upgrade.2: When using an Elemental Skill, All Elemental DMG Bonus will be increased by 12% for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 24% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, every 1,000 HP cleared in the process will provide 3% All Elemental DMG Bonus. Up to a maximum of 18% All Elemental DMG can be gained this way. This effect lasts 15s. Bond of Life: Absorbs healing for the character based on its base value, and clears after healing equal to this value is obtained.
upgrade.3: When using an Elemental Skill, All Elemental DMG Bonus will be increased by 14% for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 24% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, every 1,000 HP cleared in the process will provide 3.5% All Elemental DMG Bonus. Up to a maximum of 21% All Elemental DMG can be gained this way. This effect lasts 15s. Bond of Life: Absorbs healing for the character based on its base value, and clears after healing equal to this value is obtained.
upgrade.4: When using an Elemental Skill, All Elemental DMG Bonus will be increased by 16% for 15s, and a Bond of Life worth 24% of Max HP will be granted. This effect can be triggered once every 10s. When the Bond of Life is cleared, every 1,000 HP cleared in the process will provide 4% All Elemental DMG Bonus. Up to a maximum of 24% All Elemental DMG can be gained this way. This effect lasts 15s. Bond of Life: Absorbs healing for the character based on its base value, and clears after healing equal to this value is obtained.

upgrade.0: 施放元素战技时，所有元素伤害加成提升8%，持续15秒，并赋予生命值上限24%的生命之契，该效果每10秒至多触发一次。生命之契清除时，每清除1000点将会提供2%所有元素伤害加成，至多通过这种方式获得12%所有元素伤害加成，持续15秒。生命之契：基于其数值，吸收角色受到的治疗，在吸收了同等回复量数值的治疗后清除。

upgrade.4: 施放元素战技时，所有元素伤害加成提升16%，持续15秒，并赋予生命值上限24%的生命之契，该效果每10秒至多触发一次。生命之契清除时，每清除1000点将会提供4%所有元素伤害加成，至多通过这种方式获得24%所有元素伤害加成，持续15秒。生命之契：基于其数值，吸收角色受到的治疗，在吸收了同等回复量数值的治疗后清除。

upgrade.0: 元素スキルを発動する時、全元素ダメージ+8%、継続時間15秒。さらに、HP上限の24%を基に命の契約を付与する。この効果は10秒毎に1回のみ発動可能。命の契約がクリアされた時、1000ごとに全元素ダメージ+2%。この方式でアップできる全元素ダメージは最大12%まで、継続時間15秒。命の契約：その値の分だけキャラクターが受ける治療を吸収し、同等の回復量を吸収した後にクリアされる。
